messages.name: Aircraft linking was abnormal and could not be unlocked. Never take off...
messages.name_spanish: La vinculación de la aeronave era anormal y no ha podido ser desbloqueada. Nunca despegue...

messages.name: Unstable linking, app could not unlock aircraft.
messages.name_spanish: Vinculación inestable, la aplicación no ha podido desbloquear la aeronave.

messages.name: Cannot take off. Dual RTK antennas not ready
messages.name_spanish: No se puede despegar. Las antenas duales RTK no están listas.

messages.name: RTK signal source not selected. Cannot start.
messages.name_spanish: Fuente de señal RTK no seleccionada. No se puede iniciar.
